TEI.2.document_title: Robert C. Bruffey to Stephen F. Austin, 10-16-1822

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 548

div1.p: Mr Stephen F. Austin Sir please pay Mr Robert Cuykendall Thirty dollars and it shall be an offset for so much in our Settlement
[Endorsed:] Recd the within of S. F. Austin Decb. 6, 1828 Robert Kuykendell
